text: John J. Pacek, better known by the ring name Johnny Paychek (June 11, 1914 – December 03, 1988), was an American boxer. Though considered a journeyman, he did face Joe Louis in 1940 for the lineal heavyweight title. ==References== ==External links== *Joe Louis vs. Johnny Paychek, 1940 Category:1914 births Category:1988 deaths Category:American male boxers Category:Heavyweight boxers
title: Johnny Paychek
